name: Vitale #13
description: Your 1.01 carat Fancy Yellow diamond is very special, with only 1 in 11.000 diamonds having similar characteristics. The natural yellow colour of your diamond is attributed to a significant concentration of nitrogen atoms within its structure, resulting in the absorption of blue light. Its warm and vibrant hue is a symbol of optimism, vitality, and a zest for life. Only 150 to 200 similar diamonds enter the market yearly.
